*** Setting ***
Documentation     Normal test cases
Force Tags        f1
Default Tags      d1    d2
Metadata          Something    My Value
Suite Setup       No Operation
Suite Teardown    No Operation

*** Variable ***
${SLEEP}          0.1
${FAIL}           NO

*** Test Case ***
SubSuite1 First
    [Tags]    t1
    Log    SubSuite1_First
    Sleep    ${SLEEP}    Make sure elapsed time > 0
    Should Be Equal    ${FAIL}    NO    This test was doomed to fail
